title: Title
addCustomSheetSubtitle: Create your own music sheet with Virtual Piano notation
tempoRangeError: Tempo must be between 40 and 240 BPM
notationParsingError: Failed to parse notation. Please check the format.
notationPlaceholder: Enter Virtual Piano keyboard notation (e.g., "t y u | i o p")
sourceUrlHelper: URL where you found this sheet (for reference)
addSheetNote: Note: Custom sheets are stored locally and limited to a maximum number based on your settings. If the limit is reached, the oldest sheet will be automatically removed.
noSheetsMatchFilters: No sheets match the selected filters
deleteCustomSheetMessage: This will permanently remove {{title}} by {{artist}} from your library.
deleteBuiltInSheetMessage: This will hide {{title}} by {{artist}} from your library. The built-in sheet can be restored later.
sheetLibraryLoading: The sheet library is being loaded...
